intro: Boerlagiodendron celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes ironwood, is a tropical tree native to the Moluccas and parts of Indonesia. It is characterized by its thick, dark bark and dense, evergreen foliage. The plant has a slow growth rate and can reach heights of up to 20 meters. Its wood is highly valued for its durability and resistance to decay. Botanically, it belongs to the family Lauraceae, which includes other aromatic and medicinal plants.
